title: Square, 1939
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Henry M. Fechimer
description: Commemorative white handkerchief printed in pink and blue showing scenes of San Francisco including: Native Sons Monument, Ferry Building, Coit Tower, City Hall and other sites. Souvenir of the Golden Gate International World's Fair, 1939.
